text: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking is a 1988 American Swedish German musical adventure movie written and directed by Ken Annakin and is based on the Pippi Longstocking book series by Astrid Lindgren. It stars Tami Erin, David Seaman, Jr., Cory Crow, Eileen Brennan, Dennis Dugan, Dianne Hull, George DiCenzo, John Schuck, Dick Van Patten and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for two Razzie Awards in 1989. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1988 musical movies Category:1988 adventure movies Category:American musical movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Swedish musical movies Category:Swedish adventure movies Category:German musical movies Category:German adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ken Annakin Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
